e: ￹`Ma~`tadtad~ `to~ `ko~ `keliw~ `no~ `riko'~ `ako~.￺The stitching has come out of my clothes.￻我衣服的縫線裂開
￹`Tadtaden~ `ko~ `sowal~ `no~ `Kawas~ `a~ `mi~`patala~ `to~ `sapa~`kimad~.￺Analyze / dissect the scriptures in preparation for preaching.￻為預備講道篇必須把聖經節充分了解及注釋
d.f: ￹￺to rip out * as the stitching in a seam * with literal and figurative meaning￻縫合線扯裂，含字義與喻意的意思
